text:
@fordnation Why is #TTC the only legislated essential service being threatened with layoffs during #COVID19 pandemic?

Even non-essential service teachers are not threatened with layoffs!

Proves @ATUlocal113 Charter of Rights violated by fraudulent legislation!

#onpoli #Toronto #TOpoli
